metis.assumptions

Source: R/metis.assumptions.R
metis.assumptions.Rd

This function loads holds the different assumptions used throughout the metis package.

metis.assumptions(name = NULL)

Arguments

name

Default=NULL. Name of assumption object. List of Assumptions

  • GCAMbaseYear,

  • convEJ2MTOE,

  • convEJ2TWh,

  • convEJ2GW,

  • convEJ2GWh,

  • convGW_kW,

  • conv_C_CO2,

  • conv_MT_GT,

  • hydro_cap_fact,

  • hydro_cost_GW,

  • convUSD_1975_2010,

  • convUSD_1975_2015,

  • conv1975USDperGJ22017USDperMWh,

  • conv1975USDperGJ22017USDperMBTU,

  • convertGgTgMTC,

  • GWP,

  • US52,

  • US49,

  • countryToGCAMReg32

Value

A list of assumptions

Examples

library(metis)
a<-metis.assumptions("US49")
